title: Agent Settings
lede: Configure advanced agent settings including custom tools, webhooks, and conversation flows.

sections.title: Advanced Configuration
sections.content:
Fine-tune your agent's behavior with advanced settings and integrations.

Available Options:

  • Custom Tools: Connect external APIs and services
  • Webhooks: Real-time event notifications
  • Conversation Flows: Structured dialog paths
  • Transfer Settings: Human handoff configuration

metaTitle: Agent Settings - Configure AI Behavior & Tools | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Configure advanced agent settings including custom tools, webhooks, integrations, and behavior parameters for your AI assistants.
metaKeywords: agent settings, configuration, custom tools, webhooks, agent behavior, AI parameters, advanced settings
